body.section: Hierarchy FeeForServiceArrangement is a kind of FinancialArrangement

section.title: Description
section.p: Fee Schedule: "A list of maximum fees for providers who are on a fee-for-service basis." Fee-for-Service: "A payment system for health care where the provider is paid for each service rendered rather than a pre-negotiated amount for each patient." -eHealthInsurance.org

stentry.p: "A method of classifying [medical] services. It is used as a method of determining financing to reimburse various providers for services performed." -eHealthInsurance.org
"A list of maximum fees for providers who are on a fee-for-service basis." -eHealthInsurance.org
